episodes.description:
What happens when an "angel" brings darkness instead of light?

🖤👉 CLICK TO INSTANTLY SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/@beachhouse34?sub_confirmation=1 

This episode of Beach House 34 dives into the chilling story of Lou Castro, a self-proclaimed angel whose promises of protection and supernatural powers lay behind a web of lies, manipulation, and tragedy.

Set on a 20-acre property near Wichita, Kansas, known as Angel’s Landing, Castro created a close-knit group that seemed idyllic—until mysterious deaths began surrounding them. Gossip, a seasoned detective and a perpetrator who covered his tracks, it would take years to expose what was happening within the group, and when it was, it was horrifying 

🎙️ In "Fallen Angel," discover:
✅ How Lou Castro used cult-like tactics to control his followers.
✅ The suspicious deaths tied to Angel’s Landing.
✅ The years-long investigation that unraveled his lies.
✅ The shocking crimes that led to his conviction.
